nodes.text: A model of mobile loading gantry was in use on the estuary moon Trask, notably at a black market port. It was used to lift ships that had fallen into the sea. Around 9 ABY, one such crane was used to carry the Mandalorian bounty hunter Din Djarin's ship the Razor Crest out of the water after a crash into the sea on his mission to Trask.

Bearing some similarities with another crane walker, the OI-CT, it also had legs and a lower half similar to an AT-AT, and a crane arm extending from the top. It was strong enough to lift a waterlogged Razor Crest out of the sea.
The mobile loading gantry first appeared in "Chapter 11: The Heiress," where it was identified in the audio description.
